To create a new Teaching Group:

  1. Click on the Create a new Teaching Group button.
  2. Give the group a name and choose which Kerboodle Books and Courses you'd like the group to access.
  3. Use the Filter and/or Search facility to find the Teachers you want to add to the group and tick the boxes next to their names. Then click Save.
  4. Enter a Group Code for your Teaching Group and then click Finish.
